        public boolean isGPSEnabled()

                                                   double longitude)
        Return a string indicating the location from GPS coordinates
        Parameters:
        latitude -
        longitude -
        Returns:
        Returns in format "City|Country". Returns null if unable to find one.

        public void onLocationChanged(Location location)
